post:
<em>&nbsp;<em>

[![BudgetNode](https://budgetnode.com/images/logo.png)](https://budgetnode.com)  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

**[BudgetNode](https://budgetnode.com)** is a brand of Access Internet Ltd (Company Number: _10219199_).

Our aim is to provide good quality services and support without the high price tag.

All services come with a 7 day money back guarantee if the service is not as described. We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card (via 2Checkout), and Bitcoin.

<em>&nbsp;<em>

Today we're excited to launch a brand new location as well as KVM both at the same time!

We're now in US East (Ashburn), US West (Los Angeles), and Europe (Netherlands). KVM services to follow in the US soon!

Along with this we have a brand new feature that I haven't seen much: **custom ISOs** right from the control panel! No need to contact support!

This is an in-house built feature that we're excited to release for the first time with our KVM line in the Netherlands.

**Addons**:

    Additional IPv4: $1/month or $10/year  
    DirectAdmin: $10/month
<em>&nbsp;<em>

__________
**Features**
-

* 100Mbps or 1Gbps Port Speed (depending on plan)
* Free Internal/Private Network
* Delegated IPv4 Space
* IPv6: < 1 month (pending switch replacement)
* Shared ACL DDoS Protection
* Edge firewall rules possible (block or ratelimit protocols).
* Full KVM Virtualization
* Instant Provisioning (subject to fraud screening)
* SolusVM Control Panel
* Instant rDNS Control
* Custom ISOs right from the panel (**NEW**)
* OS Templates: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, OpenSUSE, Scientific Linux, Linux Mint & Desktop Environments

__________
**Hardware**
-

Services are provisioned on the following hardware:

* Dual Intel Xeon E5-2620v4
* 64GB DDR4 ECC RAM
* Enterprise 4 x 2TB SATA-3 6Gb/s Drives in RAID10
* Supermicro 4-bay Hotswap Chassis  
<em>&nbsp;<em>
